trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class for a key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰識別碼子句的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時，通常並不需要使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references reference security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考則會參考未包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰識別碼子句型別。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰識別碼子句型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When this security key identifier is serialized into XML, the `clauseType` parameter is serialized as the `ValueType` attribute of the `<SecurityTokenReference>` element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個安全性金鑰識別碼序列化成 XML 時，`clauseType` 參數就會序列化成 `ValueType` 項目的 `<SecurityTokenReference>` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰識別碼子句型別。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key identifier clause type, nonce, and the derived key length.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰識別碼子句型別、Nonce 以及衍生金鑰長度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) does not support the creation of implied derived key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 不支援建立隱含的衍生金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: However, WCF processes incoming SOAP messages that contain implied key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 不過，WCF 會處理包含隱含金鑰識別碼的傳入 SOAP 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a key can be created.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出是否能夠建立金鑰的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a key can be created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以建立金鑰，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a key can be created using the parameters passed into a constructor, override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CanCreateKey%2A> method to return `true` and implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CreateKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當金鑰可以透過使用傳入至建構函式的參數建立時，此時要覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CanCreateKey%2A> 方法，以便傳回 `true` 和實作 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CreateKey%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰識別碼子句型別。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause type.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰識別碼子句型別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a key based on the parameters passed into the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 根據傳入建構函式的參數來建立金鑰。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the created key.
trans-unit.target: 包含所建立金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />。

trans-unit.source: When a key can be created using the parameters passed into a constructor, override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CanCreateKey%2A> method to return `true` and implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CreateKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當金鑰可以透過使用傳入至建構函式的參數建立時，此時要覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CanCreateKey%2A> 方法，以便傳回 `true` 和實作 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.CreateKey%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 取得衍生金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 衍生金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) does not support the creation of implied derived key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 不支援建立隱含的衍生金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: However, WCF processes incoming SOAP messages that contain implied key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 不過，WCF 會處理包含隱含金鑰識別碼的傳入 SOAP 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the nonce that was used to generate the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來產生衍生金鑰的 Nonce。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the nonce that was used to generate the derived key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，其中包含用來產生衍生金鑰的 Nonce。

trans-unit.source: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) does not support the creation of implied derived key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 不支援建立隱含的衍生金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: However, WCF processes incoming SOAP messages that contain implied key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 不過，WCF 會處理包含隱含金鑰識別碼的傳入 SOAP 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key identifier clause ID.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定金鑰識別碼子句 ID。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause ID.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰識別碼子句 ID。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When this security key identifier is serialized into XML, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.Id%2A> property is serialized as the `Id` attribute of the `<SecurityTokenReference>` element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個安全性金鑰識別碼序列化成 XML，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.Id%2A>屬性序列化為`Id`屬性`<SecurityTokenReference>`項目。

trans-unit.source: If the property is `null`, an `Id` attribute is not included in the `<SecurityTokenReference>` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性是`null`、`Id`屬性不包含在`<SecurityTokenReference>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出這個執行個體的金鑰識別碼是否相等於指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is the same instance as the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> 是與目前執行個體相同的執行個體，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
